params.flags: a combination of `-` symbols and english lowercase letters
params.thread_name: The name of the thread to create or '-' to use the current channel
params.ids: Comma-separated list of message IDs to relocate
params.archive_in: Duration after which the thread will be archived
params.title: Determines whether the messages get titled with author name and time they were sent

description: Relocate specified messages to a new thread or the current channel

logs.invalid-archive-in: Error: Invalid archive duration. Please use a valid time format (e.g., '60m', '2h', '1d').
